Yui

Korean: 유이

Country:

South Korea

Height:
5'2" (157 cm)
Group (2022-present):
NTORE

Introduction

Yui (Korean: 유이; Japanese: ゆい), is a South Korean singer under To Hermitage. She is a member of the live idol girl group NTORE and its sub-unit HamCheese Revolution.
